ca.ubc.magic.icd.web.oauth
Class OAuthClient

java.lang.Object
  ca.ubc.magic.icd.web.oauth.OAuthClient
Direct Known Subclasses:
CoffeeShopClient
public class OAuthClient
extends java.lang.Object

Provides an abstract interface to OAuth 1.0 protocols as per RFC5849.

Author:
skidson

Constructor Detail

OAuthClient

public OAuthClient(java.lang.String baseURL,
                   java.lang.String requestTokenURL,
                   java.lang.String userAuthorizationURL,
                   java.lang.String accessTokenURL,
                   java.lang.String consumerKey,
                   java.lang.String consumerSecret)
Provides an abstract interface to OAuth 1.0 protocols.

Parameters:
baseURL - the base URL for the web service (e.g. http://www.example.com/).
requestTokenURL - the URL extension to obtain a request token (e.g. http://www.example.com/oauth/request_token/).
userAuthorizationURL - the URL extension to authorize a user (e.g. http://www.example.com/oauth/authorize/).
accessTokenURL - the URL extension to obtain an access token (e.g. http://www.example.com/oauth/authorize/).
consumerKey - the pre-determiend consumer key for the service.
consumerSecret - pre-determiend consumer secret for the service.
Method Detail

getRequestToken

public java.lang.String getRequestToken()
                                 throws java.io.IOException
Fetches an OAuth request token from this client's service.

Returns:
a string containing an OAuth request token
Throws:
java.io.IOException

getAuthorizationParameters

private java.lang.String[][] getAuthorizationParameters()
Returns a string containing OAuth authorization parameters intended for use in an http request's Authorization header. Returned parameters are formatted as name/value pairs seperated with "=" and delimited by "," - following OAuth1.0 specifications outlined in RFC5849.

Returns:
a string containing OAuth authorization parameter name/value pairs seperated with "=" and delimited by ",".

normalize

private java.lang.String normalize(java.lang.String[][] parameters,
                                   java.lang.String delim,
                                   boolean quoted)
Returns a string normalized to RFC5849 specifications. Note that a HashMap is not used here as it is important we keep the parameters in order.

Parameters:
parameters - a 2d array of name/value pairs.
delim - the desired deliminating character between parameters.
quoted - whether the value portion of the parameter should be in quotations.
Returns:
a string of name/value pairs.

getSignature

private java.lang.String getSignature()
Returns a signature in the format determined by this client's encoding value.

Returns:
a string for this client's signature.

encode

private java.lang.String encode(java.lang.String data,
                                java.lang.String format)
                         throws java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException
Encodes the string with the specified encoding type. Wraps URLEncoder.encode()

Parameters:
data - the string to be encoded.
format - the desired encoding format.
Returns:
an encoded string.
Throws:
java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException

next

private void next()
Updates this client's nonce and timestamp for next request.

nextNonce

private java.lang.String nextNonce()
Generates a new nonce.

Returns:
a nonce value as a string.

setConsumerKey

public void setConsumerKey(java.lang.String consumerKey)
Sets the value of this client's consumer key.

Parameters:
consumerKey - the consumer key.

setConsumerSecret

public void setConsumerSecret(java.lang.String consumerSecret)
Sets the vvalue of this client's consumer secret, corresponding to the consumer key.

Parameters:
consumerSecret - the consumer secret.

setEncoding

public void setEncoding(OAuthClient.Encoding encoding)
Sets the encoding type of this OAuth client (PLAINTEXT, HMAC_SHA1, RSA_SHA1).

Parameters:
encoding - the new encoding type.

public void setEncoding(java.lang.String encoding)
Sets the encoding type of this OAuth client (PLAINTEXT, HMAC_SHA1, RSA_SHA1).

Parameters:
encoding - the new encoding type.
